data.text: -Does the chemistry come back just like that?

data.text: Did it feel odd to you when you walked on set?

data.text: -Yeah. -Shouldn't we be different?

title: Helen Hunt and Paul Reiser Tease a Stranger Things Cameo on Mad About You
